EditTextPreference.android:title: Sensor Poll Rate
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Polling rate of inertial sensors in Hz (Default:20).

EditTextPreference.android:title: Ping Interval
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Time interval between each chirp in ms (Default:50).

EditTextPreference.android:title: Carrier Frequency
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The starting frequency for emitting sound signal in Hz (Default:8000).

EditTextPreference.android:title: Frequency Band
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Frequency range for modulation in Hz (Default:2000).

EditTextPreference.android:title: Number of Emitting
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Number of continuous emitting for batch processing (Default: 20).
